Confidence intervals for
improvement in R-squared
are generated using
the `DeltaRSqNB()` function from the `betaNB` package.
In this example,
we use the data set and the model used in
[betaNB: Example Using the BetaNB Function](example-beta-nb.html).


``` r
library(betaNB)
```




``` r
df <- betaNB::nas1982
```

### Regression

Fit the regression model using the `lm()` function.


``` r
object <- lm(QUALITY ~ NARTIC + PCTGRT + PCTSUPP, data = df)
```

### Nonparametric Bootstrap


``` r
nb <- NB(object)
```

### Improvement in R-squared

#### Normal-Theory Approach


``` r
out <- DeltaRSqNB(nb, alpha = 0.05)
```

## Methods

### summary

Summary of the results of `DeltaRSqNB()`.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "pc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "pc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0600 5000 0.0811 0.3142
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0489 5000 0.0350 0.2233
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0334 5000 0.0089 0.1359
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bc")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bc"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0600 5000 0.0915 0.3329
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0489 5000 0.0413 0.2394
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0334 5000 0.0128 0.1505
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
summary(out, type = "bca")
#> Call:
#> DeltaRSqNB(object = nb, alpha = 0.05)
#> 
#> Improvement in R-squared
#> type = "bca"
#>            est     se    R   2.5%  97.5%
#> NARTIC  0.1859 0.0600 5000 0.0941 0.3476
#> PCTGRT  0.1177 0.0489 5000 0.0455 0.2525
#> PCTSUPP 0.0569 0.0334 5000 0.0115 0.1452
```

### coef

Return the vector of estimates.


``` r
coef(out)
#>    NARTIC    PCTGRT   PCTSUPP 
#> 0.1858925 0.1176542 0.0568722
```

### vcov

Return the sampling covariance matrix.


``` r
vcov(out)
#>                NARTIC        PCTGRT       PCTSUPP
#> NARTIC   0.0036034105 -0.0003057728 -0.0002109281
#> PCTGRT  -0.0003057728  0.0023931056 -0.0002138429
#> PCTSUPP -0.0002109281 -0.0002138429  0.0011134318
```

### confint

Return confidence intervals.

#### Percentile Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "pc")
#>               2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.081074076 0.3142319
#> PCTGRT  0.035026492 0.2232859
#> PCTSUPP 0.008886648 0.1358551
```

#### Bias Corrected Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bc")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.09154686 0.3329394
#> PCTGRT  0.04134587 0.2394157
#> PCTSUPP 0.01282660 0.1504544
```

#### Bias Corrected and Accelerated Confidence Intervals


``` r
confint(out, level = 0.95, type = "bca")
#>              2.5 %    97.5 %
#> NARTIC  0.09413845 0.3475894
#> PCTGRT  0.04553739 0.2525032
#> PCTSUPP 0.01145043 0.1451618
```
